sources.title: Operation Delta Force 2: Mayday | Full Movie in HD | Explosive 90s Action!
sources.description:
Operation Delta Force 2: Mayday - A ship captained by the father (Dale Dye) of the leader (Michael McGrady) of Delta Force is taken hostage by terrorists. As might be expected the force is sent in to stop them.
1997.  Stars: Michael McGrady, John Simon Jones, Robert Patteri
